CustomField.description: ** Required ** The Visualforce Page to use as the Template for the Page. Defaults to the value of the "Default Visualforce Template" configured for the related Site.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Required ** The Visualforce Page to use as the Template for the Page. Defaults to the value of the "Default Visualforce Template" configured for the related Site.
CustomField.label: Visualforce Template
